long_description: The sleek, low-profile Ruffwear Singletrak Hydration Dog Pack is ideal for your dusty, thirsty dog's trail adventures in dry climates. 2 removable Platypus(R) collapsible water reservoirs (included) let your dog its own carry water; 2 external stash pockets fit a collapsible bowl, leash and pick-up bags. Body-hugging saddlebags resist shifting, snagging and flopping. 5 points of adjustability offer a customizable fit. Light and breathable materials help keep your dog cool and comfortable. Ruffwear Singletrak Hydration Dog Pack features reflective accents that provide 360deg of visibility in low light.
short_description: The sleek, low-profile Ruffwear Singletrak Hydration Dog Pack is ideal for your dusty, thirsty dog's trail adventures in dry climates.
